title: £5bn hostile takeover offer for Just Eat sparks hope of bidding war
text:
Internet firm Prosus has launched a shock £5bn takeover offer for food delivery firm Just Eat – leaving investors praying for a bidding war.

Prosus – the Dutch arm of South African tech behemoth Naspers – tabled an all-cash offer for the business on Tuesday, gatecrashing Just Eat’s own plans for a £9bn merger with its rival Takeaway.com.

The swoop has been rejected by Just Eat’s board, but would see shareholders get a 20pc premium on the firm’s current share price and could still be rammed through if it wins their backing.

However, investors said they are now hoping that other bidders will join the party – potentially leading to even higher offers.

Just Eat rejected the Proteus bid, insisting...
description: Internet firm Prosus has launched a shock £5bn takeover offer for food delivery firm Just Eat – leaving investors praying for a bidding war.
